item.title: MIUI OS2.0.201.0.VOICNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi Civi 5 Pro China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi Civi 5 Pro China

Codename: luming

Version: OS2.0.201.0.VOICNXM | 15.0

Size: 9.9 GB

MD5: 8442843cd304b0228b02b8fe5c77df85

Changelog:
[System animations]
Optimization: Interrupt animation when entering subpages within apps
Optimization: Interrupt animation during app transitions
Optimization: Interrupt animation when closing apps in Landscape mode
[System]
New: Home screen wallpaper now supports a blur effect
Optimization: Immersive effect for full screen indicator in certain scenarios
Optimization: Updated styles for some classic pages
Optimization: Animation effects when launching apps
Optimization: In certain screens, larger text sizes are now supported
Optimization: Adjusted the long-press gesture for the full screen indicator to reduce accidental wake-ups of Xiaomi Hyper XiaoAi
Optimization: Stability of animations when opening and closing apps
Fix: Issues with animations when opening or closing apps
Fix: Wallpapers disappeared in rare cases when opening or closing apps
Fix: Occasional display glitches when opening or closing apps
[Xiaomi Hyper XiaoAi]
New: Xiaomi Hyper XiaoAi memory
· Record ID numbers, addresses, schedules, web links, and more via voice or text; screen recognition can also extract and save ID numbers from images.
· Use voice commands to quickly locate information Xiaomi Hyper XiaoAi has memorized.
· Update Xiaomi Hyper XiaoAi to version 7.4 or later in GetApps to use these features.
[Home screen]
New: Home screen icon text now displays shadows over light wallpaper areas for better readability
[Basic experience]
Optimization: Tweaked the Storage refresh algorithm so it activates more often
[App vault]
New: Travel assistant now supports adding trips manually
[Lock screen]
New: Lock screen wallpapers now support lens effect
New: Customizable Lock screen shortcuts
Optimization: Fingerprint unlock now supports new animations
[Settings]
Optimization: Added a shortcut to system navigation settings in Home screen settings
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Optimization: Custom notifications now support unfolding
[Accessibility]
Fix: Touch gestures stopped working in TalkBack mode
Fix: Volume buttons didn't work in TalkBack mode
Fix: Issues that prevented Recorder from capturing TalkBack audio
Fix: Issues with announcements for unselected items in Calendar and other apps
Fix: Some buttons weren't announced in several apps, including Settings, Control center, Messaging, Contacts, Weather, Notes, and Browser
More accessibility fixes are available in Xiaomi Community

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.103.0.VOICNXM Recovery update for Xiaomi Civi 5 Pro China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi Civi 5 Pro China

Codename: luming

Version: OS2.0.103.0.VOICNXM | 15.0

Size: 7.8 GB

MD5: ed9142008afafcfce80a824cf28c24b8

Changelog:
[Alive Design Philosophy]
Alive Design Philosophy unveils fresh, vibrant design across the whole system, making every interaction feel smooth and alive.
All-new Artistic Lock screen:
Artistic Lock screen brings new templates and effects inspired by classic designs, giving your device a cinematic look every time you unlock it.
AI dynamic wallpapers:
AI-generated dynamic wallpapers bring static images to life.
All-new Gallery:
With AI and reorganized collections, Gallery makes your memories even more vivid.
All-new Weather
Real-time Weather Engine 2.0 shows you the sky and clouds just like in real life – even lets you see rainbows and the Milky Way.
All-new Calendar:
The new Desktop calendar adds a touch of ritual to your day.
All-new Clock:
Updated Clock uses a more refined display structure for a more elegant, easy-to-read look.
Updated widgets:
Enhanced widgets allow you to customize and combine information on your Home screen for a more efficient, stylish experience.
Updated animations:
A full-scale animation upgrade makes every interaction flow smoothly and feel stable, responsive, and comfortable.
[Xiaomi HyperCore]
Xiaomi HyperCore, Xiaomi's proprietary core technology platform, enhances performance, graphics, network, and security.
New microarchitecture scheduler:
A new in-house microarchitecture scheduler manages tasks more efficiently.
New dynamic memory:
New technology allows precise resource allocation, so apps start up faster.
Storage 2.0:
Improved file loading for long-term smooth performance.
Upgraded rendering:
Upgraded rendering for multitasking extends battery life.
Heterogeneous computing:
Enhanced rendering pipeline boosts hardware performance for faster, more efficient visuals.
Enhanced wireless compatibility:
Enhanced wireless compatibility boosts network stability for more reliable connections.
5G full-link prediction technology:
Networks can now be optimized networks for calls and live-streaming.
[Xiaomi HyperConnect]
Upgraded cross-device connectivity framework.
Upgraded Home screen+:
You can drag phone apps onto Xiaomi tablets or add them as native apps.
Updated cross-device camera:
The upgraded cross-device camera allows you to use two cameras simultaneously for multi-angle live streaming.
Updated shared clipboard:
Shared clipboard allows you to batch copy text for easier multi-device sharing.
Smart home devices:
Smart home upgrades improve the consistency of control experience of various terminal devices, covering Xiaomi Smart Hub, Home screen widgets, and the Xiaomi Home app.
"Human × Car × Home" smart ecosystem:
Enhanced interconnectivity for phones, wearables, and cars, adding 62 new ways for your devices to interact with each other.
Documents:
Take document editing to a new level with over 100 supported file formats, including documents, spreadsheets, and presentations across devices.
Upgraded Xiaomi Smart Hub
In upgraded Xiaomi Smart Hub, you can add sticky notes to your TV screensaver and use PiP.
[Xiaomi HyperAI]
Xiaomi HyperAI reshapes system apps with AI, enhancing productivity and usability and creating a dynamic, ever-evolving user experience.
All-new AI writing:
Generate, summarize, expand, polish, and correct text wherever you are with AI writing.
AI audio recognition:
Now, AI can recognize audio and transcribe in real time, summarize automatically, and mark speakers.
All-new AI search:
With AI search, you can find photos, videos, messages, notes, and recordings accurately.
AI Interpreter:
Upgraded translation and interpretation features.
AI data security:
End-to-end encryption is provided for sensitive data.
Trusted computing architecture:
Ensure the security of your data across devices and cloud.
[System animations]
New: During the process of opening or closing apps, the full screen indicator follows the window's movement
New: When quickly opening and closing apps, multiple app animations are displayed simultaneously
[System]
New: Support for one-tap clipboard clearing
New: Now you can make voice calls via Bluetooth with Cross-device communication
[Xiaomi Hyper XiaoAi]
Your smart personal assistant
· New visuals with multiple ways to activate the assistant anytime you need it.
Multimodal interaction: Perceive the world around you with your camera and easily recognize objects that appear on your screen.
· Improved search: Supports natural language searches for photos, videos, documents, notes, and recordings.
Smart scenes: Seamlessly integrates system features, letting you perform complex tasks with a single step. This feature also learns your patterns to offer helpful services proactively.
[Control center]
New: Flashlight brightness adjustment page
New: Certain devices now support adjustable flashlight brightness
New: Notification spotlight for flashlight
[Mi Share]
New: Support for file transfers between different devices using different Xiaomi Accounts
